page.title: 09ICOMB SCHOOL
page.content: The school was bulit in 1871. At this time there was about 170 people in the village but today thre are only 85.The school had one classroom plus a cloak room.In the 1950's It had 2 teachers and the village hall was licened for use by the school,one teacher with some of the pupils going the hall after morning assembly.Later on the number of children fell,It went back to one teacher and fially In 1962 the school was closed.Today It Is a private house,but still has the school bell,high on the wall outside.Now all the children In Icomb go to Bledington on a school bus.At bledington the children learn R.E.,English,Problem solving,Maths,Reading,Maypole,Swimming ,Running,Drama,Gymnastics,History, Sicence.Etc.
